author: kwin
msg: SLING-4322 expose stack trace for failures in integration tests

embed stacktrace in all responses from the JUnit servlet (plain text, Json, HTML), log a warning with stacktrace on the server, expose the stacktrace on the client when using the SlingRemoteTestRunner

author: ylavic
msg: mod_ssl: update the current handshake server once a full regenegotation
succeeds, it is the new reference for further renegotiation or SNI check.
